abstrac: CAD Modeling, New Design, FEA Analysis, CFD Analysis
bio:
About us :
SuperDesignTech is an ISO 9001:2008 compliant technology consulting and services provider with its headquarters in Pune, India and offices in USA and Poland. SuperDesignTech has been serving clients in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Canada, UK, Finland, USA, Thailand and the gulf region for the last 5 years and has a SEZ India innovation centre supporting its Global distributed Delivery engagements. SuperDesignTech provides Engineering and IT consulting Services that includes CAD 3D Modeling, 2D Detailing/Drafting, Finite Element Analysis of Components, Sub-Components and Systems, Computational Fluid Dynamics Analysis, Concept Design and Styling, Re-engineering, Reverse Engineering, Parametric Design of Systems, Design for Manufacturing/Assembly, Legacy Data Migration and Conversion, Tool Design and Fixture Design, Detailing/Drafting conforming to Standards like ASME/DIN/ISO, Heat Transfer/Thermal Analysis, Weight Optimization. Mechanical - Adopting ASME and ANSI standards, Perform and document Engineering Tests,
Engineering analysis, Design/Modify Mechanical Engineer Layouts/schematics and/or detailed drawings/specifications and Product release, Digitization of Documents A4 Size to A0 Size Drawings, Document Scanning, Digitization, and Paper to CAD service, data process and data conversion.

Our customers are of all sizes ranging from start-ups to large enterprises who realize that they need professional technology and outsourcing solutions.

SuperDesignTech has in place a team of hardcore professionals with extensive experience in design to manufacturing to handle the most demanding customer requirements. The team consists of parametric based modeling experts, engineers with foundation in research and development, tool design, Computational Fluid Dynamics, Finite Element Analysis, Product data management.
We have a separate arm dealing with Software Consulting Projects.


Thanks.
Warm regards,
Rohit Sharma
SuperDesignTech, Pune India - 411043

abstrac: Stable Diffusion, ChatGPT, MidJourney, LaTeX, Python, Data Analytics
bio:
Certified Machine Learning Engineer, Data Analytics, Stable Diffusion, ChatGPT, DALL-E, MidJourney, Deep Learning, and AI-based projects.

As a highly experienced Data Scientist and Machine Learning Engineer with a strong mathematical background, I have successfully delivered multiple projects using cutting-edge technologies such as OpenAI GPT-3, DALL-E 2, MidJourney, ChatGPT, and Stable Diffusion. I am well-versed in various data analytics, machine learning, and data engineering domains.

I possess a deep understanding of data pre-processing, visualization, and extraction, having worked with tools such as Python, R, pandas, dataframes, Microsoft PowerBI, RESTfull API, SQL, Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse, Postgres, MySQL, and MongoDB. I am also proficient in managing AWS/ES2/S3 infrastructure.

I have extensive experience in various areas of data science, such as Natural Language Processing, Regression and Prediction Models, Database Management, Time Series Analysis, Fraud and Anomaly Detection, Recommendation Systems, and Computer Vision. My projects have consistently demonstrated my ability to turn complex data into insights that drive business value.

abstrac: Inc Magazine Featured Full Stack Marketer
bio:
Who do I work with? ??

I can help anyone! I have worked with a variety of marketing channels in a variety of industries from global brands like Linkedin and The New York Times to startups who just got their first round of funding. Whether your business is big or small I CAN help.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I've worked with clients that have multi-million dollar revenues and with clients that have just decided they want to go into business; I love the challenges that come with both.

Here are some of the other industries I've worked in: technology, finance, non-profit, education, dental, health and fitness, real estate, travel, self-improvement, sales, construction, training, publishing, and internet blogging.

How can I help you? ??

My main focus is to increase your revenue and drive sales through digital marketing and advertising, Simple!

I am a very hard working individual with a variety of skills to offer, including; social media marketing, social media management, Facebook advertising, content creation, SEO, internet marketing and social media growth. My main focus is to increase your revenue and drive sales through digital marketing. 

When you hire me, you're also getting full access to my WHOLE agency team, at no extra cost. I have experts in Facebook advertising, Instagram growth, copywriting, blog writing, SEO, reputation management, graphic design, web design.

I would love to help you and bring value to your company, so please get in touch. Any questions? Just ask. Thank you! 

**FREE 30 MINUTE CONSULTATION** Do you think I am a good fit for your job? Let's chat. I offer a free 30-minute consultation to everyone reading this, let's discuss your problems and see how I can help you. Let's get this show on the road, send me a job invitation.

bio:
Anna's here at your service! I'm here to help you achieve your business goals. Providing high quality web and graphic designs services.

I help my ecommerce clients building their brand and marketing assets. From crafting brand idendity design, Web, social media design, packaging design, menu, digital creatives, with accompaniment of strategy.

As a designer with experienced, I understand the value of digital branding to every business. Digital branding is not just a trend and beauty but it's a core foundation of your business that connects with your target market and create an experience that will eventually be part of their lives and personality. 

I'm very excited to know more about you and your business. 
Let's deep dive in your goals, challenges and desires.

Xoxo,
Anna
Message me anytime and will response within 24 hours

abstrac: "If you can imagine it, we can create it".
bio:
Greetings,
Hi, I'm Waqas Yasir I have completed my MPhil in Computer Science in 2021 and I have done BS (Honors) in Computer Science in 2018. I have done many certificates related to computer science like Graphic Designing, Freelancing, Digital Marketing, WordPress, SEO, Digital literacy, AutoCAD, E-commerce Management, QuickBooks, Windows Server Management & Security from the University of Colorado in 2020, CCNA (R&S), CCNA Security, MCSE Windows Server R2 2012.
I have been working as a Freelancer/ Graphic Designer since 2010.  I'm a professional Graphic Designer, video editor and I do editing of Intro title, Outer title, video editing of YouTube, Youtube Thumbnail, motion graphics, wedding party Video, birthday event Video, Business Cards, Logo design, flyer design, Brochure design, poster designer, whiteboard animation, Photo restoration, Photo retouching, Facebook marketing. I also do Data entry, Facebook Ads, WordPress web development & customization, PHP and MySQL Database, Google AdSense, Google AdWords, Digital Marketing, LinkedIn Lead Generation, Conversion of the file, PDF to word & excel Email validation, web scraping. Mostly I use Adobe Photoshop, illustrator, and adobe premiere pro cc 2020 for this.
I have gone through your project placement and it matches my expertise. If you award me the project, I'd be delighted to discuss this further and get started for you as soon as possible. I need to discover more about your project details so please message me for a little more conversation.
Please do review my proposal. Thanks! 
Visit My Portfolio: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fFYO0NB4_R0
